Sergia.text: Wait for me this evening, will call

Serratim.text: Wait my letter before taking any action

Sessito.text: Wait my telegram before taking any action

Sestiana.text: Wait until you hear further before ---

Setanium.text: Wait until you receive my letter

Setosus.text: Am waiting here for a letter from you before starting

Sevoco.text: Am waiting here for a telegram from you before starting

Sextiana.text: Weather too unfavourable, do not come

Sexus.text: Weather too unfavourable, return by rail

Siccanus.text: Weather too unfavourable, returning by next train

Siccine.text: Weather too unfavourable to put to sea

Siderior.text: Weather too unfavourable to put to sea, will telegraph departure

Sido.text: Weather too unfavourable to start to-day

Signinus.text: Weather very fine, sea quite smooth

Signum.text: Weather very fine, shall expect you ---

Silaceus.text: Weather very fine, shall expect you this morning

Siliqua.text: Weather very fine, shall expect you this afternoon
